story_99_00600/2401_1001_0200_10:
You know why we’re all gathered here,
don’t you?
story_99_00600/2401_0302_0500_10: I’m sure it’s for a good reason.
story_99_00600/2401_0402_0600_10: That’s right! We’ve got something fun in mind.
story_99_00600/2401_1001_0700_10:
You know how Champions and Elite Four members
from all over the world have gathered here
on Pasio?
story_99_00600/2401_1001_0800_10:
It’d be a shame to let such a perfect opportunity
go to waste.
story_99_00600/2401_1001_0900_10:
So, I figured I could give everyone a taste of the
Pokémon League experience by having them face
off against Elite Four members and a Champion!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1000_10:
Whaddaya think? Great idea, isn’t it? Sure, I’m a
former Champion now, but I’m way stronger than
I used to be!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1100_10:
Feh... He’s that old duff’s grandson, all right.
Putting us to work like a real taskmaster.
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1200_10:
Ha ha ha ha! Weren’t you the first one here,
Agatha? You can’t fool us with your grumbling!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1300_10:
You were just as excited to come here as I was,
weren’t you. Hoo! Hah!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1400_10: Oh, stuff it, Bruno! I’m just an early riser!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1500_10:
You all haven’t changed one bit, I see! I must
admit, I’m looking forward to these battles myself!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1600_10:
I, Lance, stand ready to give the sync pairs here
a true challenge as the most formidable opponent
they’ll ever face!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1700_10:
Oh, really? And who says you’re the toughest
challenge they’ll face?
story_99_00600/2401_1001_1800_10: We’ve gotten pretty strong ourselves, you know!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2000_10: We’ve all been training hard to get stronger.
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2100_10:
As you can see, we’re all fired up and ready
to battle!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2200_10:
You’ll really need to prove yourself if you wanna
take us on.
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2300_10:
Let’s see... I bet someone who’s got all the PML
badges would give us some good matches!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2400_10:
Beating the Elite Four when they’re at their best is
no easy feat, you know!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2500_10:
The rules are different, too. You can face the
Elite Four in any order you want, but you’ll need
a sure-fire strategy to get through to the end.
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2600_10:
And if you do beat the Elite Four, then you’re up
against me, and I’m even stronger than they are!
You better come crazy prepared to take me on!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2700_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... I’ll be waiting for
you at the top!
story_99_00600/2401_1001_2800_10: I’ll battle you with everything I’ve got!
